sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Button, Typography, Box, List, ListItem } from '@mui/material'; const FormConfirmAddPlant = ({ plantInfo, quantityArray, setFormConfirmVisible, handleSubmit}) => { return ( Please confirm to add your new plant. Name: {plantInfo.name} Type: {plantInfo.type} {quantityArray.map((details) =>( <> Description: {details.description} Price:Price: ${details.price} Cut: {details.type} Images {details.selectedFiles.map(file => {`${file.name.slice(0, 10)}...${file.name.slice(file.name.length - 4, file.name.length)}`} )} ))} ) } export default FormConfirmAddPlant;
